text: These are the list of personnel changes in the NBA from the 1972–73 NBA season. ==Events== If you want to see the transaction events (from July 1, 1972 to June 23, 1973), see the links below ==References== *NBA Transactions at NBA.com *1972-73 NBA Transactions| Basketball-Reference.com Transactions Category:NBA transactions
title: List of 1972–73 NBA season transactions
